review: Seriously awesome, streams better than my Xbox. Using Sling, and Amazon Prime on it right now and they're great. The beauty of having voice search and an RF remote are such a convenience. No typing, and it's one less box in front of my TV. I'm really thinking of cancelling my satellite now.Few months using this now, I've noticed that Roku has come out with the new Roku3, it has RF and voice, as well as a headphone jack on the remote so you can watch without bothering other people (baby sleeping in my case). But the biggest advantage I found is that they offer a LOT more options for apps (video streaming services) and they also show search results for Netflix and Hulu (Fire TV only shows Hulu). So I might be going for the Roku3 and selling this thing. Hopefully the streaming on the Roku is as good because this Fire TV is amazingly clear. Just need more video streaming services (No CBS for instance).
